con:config.script: //Create the properties object, and load it from the file system: //https://bowerstudios.com/node/1066 Properties props = new Properties() File propsFile = new File('test.properties') Integer rand = new Random().next(4) props.setProperty('porcupine', rand.toString()) props.store(propsFile.newWriter(), null)

Properties properties = new Properties() File propertiesFile = new File('test.properties') propertiesFile.withInputStream { properties.load(it) }
def runtimeString = 'porcupine' log.info(properties.getProperty('porcupine')) assert properties."$runtimeString" == properties.getProperty('porcupine')
